title: How to Make a Simple Death Notebook

steps.title: Get a journal, any kind, just no ring, a black folder, a glue stick, and scissors.
steps.content: Get a journal , any kind, just no ring, a black folder, a glue stick, and scissors.

steps.title: Go online, go to Google Images and type 'Death Note Letters'.
steps.content: Go online, go to Google Images and type 'Death Note Letters'. It will show you the D/E/A/T/H/N/O/T/E letters. Or you can draw them yourself and cut them out and paste them on the notebook if you want.

steps.title: Cut the letters out.
steps.content: Cut the letters out. It does not have to be perfect because the background will be black. Leave the letters somewhere safe.

steps.title: Get your folder and cut out the pockets.
steps.content: Get your folder and cut out the pockets.

steps.title: Cut the folder as the same size as the journal and glue it on top.
steps.content: Cut the folder as the same size as the journal and glue it on top.

steps.title: Glue the letters together on the cover.
steps.content: Glue the letters together on the cover.
